title: President Biden Announces Presidential Delegation to the Republic of Korea to Attend the Inauguration of His Excellency Yoon Suk Yeol | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to attend the Inauguration of His Excellency Yoon Suk Yeol on May 10, 2022, in Seoul, Republic of Korea.Mr. Douglas Emhoff, Second Gentleman of the United States, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:Mr. Christopher Del Corso, Chargé d’Affaires ad interim, U.S. Embassy SeoulThe Honorable Martin J. Walsh, Secretary of Labor of the United StatesThe Honorable Ami Bera, United States Representative (D), CaliforniaThe Honorable Marilyn Strickland, United States Representative (D), WashingtonThe Honorable Todd Sunhwae Kim, Assistant Attorney General, Environment and Natural Resources Division, Department of JusticeThe Honorable Linda Hee Jung Shim, Special Assistant to the President for Economic Agency PersonnelMs. Min Jin Lee, Author and Writer-in-Residence at Amherst College
